cd raw/src
tcc -o make ar.c arscan.c commands.c default.c dir.c expand.c file.c function.c guile.c hash.c implicit.c job.c load.c loadapi.c main.c misc.c output.c posixos.c read.c remake.c remote-stub.c rule.c shuffle.c signame.c strcache.c variable.c version.c vpath.c ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/lib/3rd-party/getopt/getopt_long.c ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/lib/glibc/vsf_linux_glibc_ctype.c -I . -I ../../port -I ${TCC_PATH}/include -I ${VSF_LINUX_PATH}/applet -I ${VSF_PATH}/source -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/setjmp -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/stdint -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/assert -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/uchar -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/math -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/inttypes -I ${VSF_PATH}/source/shell/sys/linux/include/simple_libc/limits -fms-extensions -shared -fPIC
